qcv1

Interface QRegister

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MRegister

    public interface QRegister
    Interface of a general quantum register
    Author:
    Michael Chiang

      • numOfQubit

        int numOfQubit()
        Get the number of qubits in the register

      • numOfStates

        int numOfStates()
        Get the number of basis states in the register

        Set all basis states to equal amplitude

      • setAmplitude

        void setAmplitude(int state,
                double[] amps)
        Set the amplitude of a basis state
        Parameters:
        state - Basis state
        amps - Complex amplitude of the basis state [real, imag]

      • setAmplitude

        void setAmplitude(int state,
                double real,
                double imag)
        Set the amplitude of a basis state
        Parameters:
        state - Basis state
        real - Real part of the amplitude
        imag - Imaginary part of the amplitude

      • getAmplitude

        double[] getAmplitude(int state)
        Get the amplitude of a basis state
        Parameters:
        state - Basis state
        Returns:
        Complex amplitude of this basis state

      • getAmplitude

        Matrix getAmplitude()
        Get the amplitudes of all basis states

      • getProbabilities

        double[] getProbabilities()
        Get the probabilities of measuring each of the basis states

      • measure

        int measure()
        Perform a measurement on the register (i.e. collapses the wave function to a particular basis state according to the states' probabilities)
